TopicTitle: In the second mission in the demo i see only a white line and not the orbit

Articles.Content:
In the second mission in the demo i see only a white line which suposed to be the orbit and not the whole space and orbit when i click m, so warp point to apoapsis doesen't show and i cannot click it. It is a bug on some systems ? And i run out of fuell.

Edited October 31, 2015 by roarke

Support threads go in Support, moved.

Yes it is a bug because the building states from career are not reset when starting a tutorial or scenario, this results in having a tier 1 tracking station in the tutorial which gives you early career orbits, and no maneuver nodes.

Start or return to a sandbox game or restart KSP to reset them.

Edited October 31, 2015 by sal_vager
What to do, so i won't run off fuel ? How to put the topic on [Known Issue] ?
Restart KSP and go straight to the tutorial please

Thank you, i played a third time and the bug is no more. Forget to put my specs :

Processor: Intel® Pentium® CPU G3440 @ 3.30GHz (2 CPUs), ~3.3GHz

Memory: 8192MB RAM

64 bits machine, windows 7 ultimate.

Edited October 31, 2015 by roarke
